name: Master of Illusion Express: Psychic Camera
synopsis: Master of Illusion Express titles are mind-boggling magic tricks that you perform with your Nintendo DSi system. Learn the illusions, practice up, and then amaze your friends. Your audience will never look at your Nintendo DSi system the same way againâ€¦after Master of Illusion Express: Psychic Camera proves the system has psychic powers. Astound others when taking their pictures reveals the item (such as a card, picture, letter, or number) of which they are thinking!
